description: This Hazelnut Chocolate Smoothie Bowl is a wholesome, hearty, and delicious way to start your day. Made in just 5 minutes, it's a smoothie that is packed with fiber, protein, and powerful superfoods for a meal that will fuel you up for hours.
name: Chocolate Smoothie Bowl with Hazelnut and Hemp
recipeIngredient: 1 scoop Detox Organics â€‹Chocolate Superfoods or 1 single packet, (about 1 1/2 tbsp)

recipeInstructions.text: Drain and rinse the hazelnuts. In a high-powered blend together all the smoothie ingredients until completely smooth. To start, use only 1/4 cup of milk. Add more if necessary but try and keep the smoothie as thick as possible. You want a soft-serve ice cream-like consistency.
Pour into a large bowl and top with desired toppings. Serve immediately
